<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>brc20-ticker-holders</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/brc20/{ticker}/holders"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns holders of a specific BRC-20 ticker
